subathon.clear.confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the logs?
subathon.clear.notice:
Clearing the logs will only clear the event 
logs GUI, it will not affect the gameplay
subathon.messages.event.resub: %1$s resubscribed with %3$s for a total of %2$s months
subathon.messages.restart.notice:
§aRestarting subathon
§cThe server may freeze for some seconds
subathon.messages.start.notice:
§aStarting subathon
§cThe server may freeze for some seconds
subathon.messages.start.title: §c§lSubathon started!
subathon.messages.start.subtitle: §4Let the games begin!
subathon.messages.stop.title: §c§lSubathon stopped!
subathon.messages.stop.subtitle: §4The modifier is still being applied!
subathon.messages.error.missing_channel_: Unable to start, missing channel name!
subathon.messages.error.invalid_channel_: Unable to start, invalid channel name!
subathon.messages.error.broadcast: Failed to send broadcast with id "%s"!
subathon.command.error.fatal: A fatal error occurred when executing the command!
subathon.command.reload.notice: A restart of the bot will be required for some changes to apply.
option.subathon.message_mode.description: Where the alert messages will be shown
option.subathon.font_scale.description: Defines the font scale of the value shown on the HUD
option.subathon.effect_amplifier.descrip: How much the effect will increase
option.subathon.effect_multiplier.descri:
Used to control the internal effect value
The math is: §b(multiplier * amplifier)§r
option.subathon.channel_name.description:
The channel name, visible on the 
URL after "https://www.twitch.tv/"
option.subathon.run_at_server_start.desc: Defines if the integration will start with the server
option.subathon.sub.enable.description:
Toggles the subscriptions module
Disabling it makes so subscriptions are ignored completely
option.subathon.sub.description:
Defines how much of the "subsUntilIncrement" internal variable will be decreased.
In other words, setting this to 2 will make so it is counted as 2 subs instead of one
option.subathon.sub.one_per_gift.descrip:
If enabled gifts will only increase the amplifier up to once
This doesn't limit only to gifted subs
option.subathon.bits.enable.description:
Toggles the bits module
Disabling it makes so bits are ignored completely
option.subathon.bits.min.description: The minimum amount of bits for the cheer to be considered
option.subathon.bits.modifier.descriptio:
How much of the modifier will be incremented
(this value is multiplied by the Effect Amplifier)
option.subathon.bits.cumulative.descript: The bits donated will be stored internally and when the internal amount passes the minimum bit count the counter will be increased
option.subathon.bits.once.description: Only increases the counter once, instead of bits/bit_min
option.subathon.bits.cumulative_ignore_m:
Makes so on cumulative bits mode all bits are added to the internal bit counter
instead of only cheers over the minimum amount
